references: Related: CF 134130, CF 134129, CF 199001, CF 215985, Ord. 77218. Amending: Ord. 45382
summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lot 7, Block 1, Canal Addition, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-316 and 17-252, respectively.
